Services

My Services

Automatic License Plate Recognition with OCR

An end to end web app of ALPR with OCR . This model will automatically detect License Plate of cars and read the number plate using an OCR and display it . The main reason of this app is to catch overspeeding drivers and inform the local authority using the number plate recorded .

Handwritten AlphaNumeric Recognizer using CNN

An end-to-end web app , for hand-drawn alphanumeric (Numbers and Letters) recognizer using CNN . The user themself can draw letters or numbers on th canvas and the model would predict/recognizer which letter or number it is with sound effects .

Next Word Prediction Using LSTM

An end-to-end web app , to predict the next word that might be entered by user next . The app used a type of Deep Learning model that is LSTM .

Machine Learning Applied

Application of various Supervised and Unsupervised Machine Learning Models applied of different datasets .

IPL (2009 - 2020) Analysis Using Tableau

Analysising IPL data with the help of Tableau. For details and datset check outmy GitHub.

London Accident Analysis Using Tableau .

Analysising London Accident data with the help of Tableau. For details and datset check outmy GitHub.

My Artworks

Check out my artwork . I do water painting, skecting, portraits, stiplling and many more.
